cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on July 20, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8325, Preventing Personal Conflicts of Interest in Federal Acquisition Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 113 (Monday, July 11, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. CAROLYN B. MALONEY of New York:
H.R. 8325.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H5945]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 24 - 18.

title: Preventing Personal Conflicts of Interest in Federal Acquisition Act
